meanings.definition: A lens designed to correct spherical and chromatic aberration.
meanings.sent1: The anastigmat improved the clarity of the photograph by fixing the blurriness caused by aberration.
meanings.sent2: Photographers prefer using an anastigmat lens for capturing sharp images with accurate colors.
meanings.sent3: The anastigmat lens was so good at its job that it made other lenses jealous of its perfect vision.
meanings.sent4: Her eyesight was like an anastigmat, flawlessly correcting any distortions in her view of the world.
meanings.sent5: The anastigmat lens acted like a magic wand, transforming fuzzy pictures into crystal-clear masterpieces.

meanings.definition: A camera lens that is free from astigmatism.
meanings.sent1: The photographer chose the anastigmat for its clear focus without any distortion.
meanings.sent2: With the anastigmat lens, the photographer could capture sharp images without any blurriness.
meanings.sent3: The anastigmat lens was so perfect that it made other lenses feel self-conscious about their imperfections.
meanings.sent4: Her vision through the anastigmat lens was like looking through a window to a world without any flaws.
meanings.sent5: The anastigmat lens was like a superhero, saving every photo from the clutches of astigmatism.
